item.title:
> why is it you want to switch our tooling over to this new build tool?
> it's just...better
> we need you to be more specific, you've requested 2 sprints for this
> trust me.
> if you say its because it uses Emojis and spinners in the CLI output, we have a problem
*sweats*
item.dc:creator: I Am Devloper (@iamdevloper)
item.description: > why is it you want to switch our tooling over to this new build tool? > it's just...better > we need you to be more specific, you've requested 2 sprints for this > trust me. > if you say its because it uses Emojis and spinners in the CLI output, we have a problem *sweats*

item.title:
Hey Pals 👋
I have slots coming up in September and would love work with ✨you✨. DMs open!
Stuff I do:
🎨 Web design 🏗 Front-end development 🍯 Jamstack and static site generators 📦 NodeJS 💖 #a11y and inclusive design
RTs hugely appreciated 🚀
andy-bell.design/notes/211/
item.dc:creator: Andy Bell (@andybelldesign)
item.description: Hey Pals 👋 I have slots coming up in September and would love work with ✨you✨. DMs open! Stuff I do: 🎨 Web design 🏗 Front-end development 🍯 Jamstack and static site generators 📦 NodeJS 💖 #a11y and inclusive design RTs hugely appreciated 🚀 andy-bell.design/notes/211/

item.title:
An out-of-the-blue email from a recruiter with a gmail address asking for my code samples to forward to their client?
I think this is the career opportunity I’ve been waiting for.
item.dc:creator: Ben Howdle (@ben_howdle)
item.description: An out-of-the-blue email from a recruiter with a gmail address asking for my code samples to forward to their client? I think this is the career opportunity I’ve been waiting for.

item.title: [teaching a programming class to 6 yo kids] > hey kids! welcome to your first "intro to programming" class! ready to learn? ok. today we're gonna learn how to write jira tickets, navigate office politics and how to avoid meetings! coding? nope, you'll rarely get the chance!
item.dc:creator: I Am Devloper (@iamdevloper)
